title: net: on plan9, net.Dial with tcp times out immediately
body:
by **emery@fuzzlabs.org**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
  net.Dial("tcp", "... ")
  http://play.golang.org/p/2tbP5ewNlp

What is the expected output?
  &{0x... }
  &{0x... }

What do you see instead?
  dial tcp google.com:80: i/o timeout
  &{{0x... }}


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
  8g


Which operating system are you using?
  plan9/386 (pfront)

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
  devel +9bf97fe54385

There seems to be a similar problem on windows, but with UDP instead of TCP
https://golang.org/issue/5349
